# iosxr_rsvp (Data Source)

This data source can read the RSVP configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxr_rsvp" "example" {
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `authentication_key_chain` (String) Use key-chain to authenticate RSVP signalling messages
- `authentication_life_time` (Number) Use to associate life-time for each security association
- `authentication_retransmit` (Number) Configure retransmit options
- `authentication_window_size` (Number) Use window-size to limit number of out-of-order messages
- `bandwidth_mam_percentage_max_reservable_bandwidth` (Number) Maximum reservable bandwidth
- `bandwidth_mam_percentage_max_reservable_bc0` (Number) BC0 pool
- `bandwidth_mam_percentage_max_reservable_bc1` (Number) BC1 pool
- `bandwidth_rdm_percentage_max_reservable_bc0` (Number) Maximum reservable/BC0
- `bandwidth_rdm_percentage_max_reservable_bc1` (Number) BC1 pool
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `latency_threshold` (Number) Set the latency threshold to a value in seconds (default 60)
- `logging_events_issu` (Boolean) Enable ISSU Status Logging
- `logging_events_nsr` (Boolean) Enable NSR Status Logging
- `ltrace_buffer_multiplier` (Number) trace buffer file size multiplier
- `ltrace_buffer_multiplier_common` (Boolean) Common trace buffer
- `ltrace_buffer_multiplier_dbg_err` (Boolean) Debug errors trace buffer
- `ltrace_buffer_multiplier_intf` (Boolean) Interface trace buffer
- `ltrace_buffer_multiplier_rare` (Boolean) Rare trace buffer
- `ltrace_buffer_multiplier_sig` (Boolean) Signalling trace buffer
- `ltrace_buffer_multiplier_sig_err` (Boolean) Signalling errors trace buffer
- `ltrace_buffer_multiplier_sync` (Boolean) Sync trace buffer
- `neighbors` (Attributes List) Configure RSVP neighbors for RSVP authentication (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--neighbors))
- `signalling_checksum_disable` (Boolean) Disable RSVP message checksum computation/validation
- `signalling_event_per_pulse` (Number) Set Max event sent per pulse
- `signalling_graceful_restart` (Boolean) Configure RSVP Graceful-Restart parameters
- `signalling_graceful_restart_lsp_ctype` (Boolean) Configure to send LSP's ctype for Recovery and Suggested label
- `signalling_graceful_restart_recovery_time` (Number) Configure the recovery-time
- `signalling_graceful_restart_restart_time` (Number) Configure the restart-time
- `signalling_hello_graceful_restart_refresh_interval` (Number) Set interval between successive Hello messages
- `signalling_hello_graceful_restart_refresh_misses` (Number) Set max number of consecutive missed Hello messages
- `signalling_message_bundle_disable` (Boolean) Disable bundling of outgoing RSVP messages
- `signalling_nodeid_subobject_disable` (Boolean) Disable inserting nodeid-subobject in RRO of Reservation
- `signalling_oob_vrf` (String) VRF used for out-of-band control signalling
- `signalling_patherr_state_removal_disable` (Boolean) Disable State-Removal flag for Path Error
- `signalling_prefix_filtering_acl` (String) Specify access-list name
- `signalling_prefix_filtering_default_deny_action_drop` (Boolean) Drop the packet

<a id="nestedatt--neighbors"></a>
### Nested Schema for `neighbors`

Read-Only:

- `address` (String) Configure RSVP neighbors for RSVP authentication
- `authentication_key_chain` (String) Use key-chain to authenticate RSVP signalling messages
- `authentication_life_time` (Number) Use to associate life-time for each security association
- `authentication_window_size` (Number) Use window-size to limit number of out-of-order messages
